head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths PEPI, MATTHEW J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths PEPI, MATTHEW J.

block.p: PEPI-Matthew J., September 13, 2000. Beloved husband of Maria Aracely. Loving father of Raymond and Alan. Cherished grandfather of William and Katherine. Dear brother of Anne Boyd. Reposing at the Frederick Funeral Home of Flushing, Northern Blvd. at 193rd St. Visiting hours Thursday 2-5PM and 7-10PM. Funeral Mass, Friday 9:45AM, American Martyrs R.C. Church, Union Tpke. and Bell Blvd, Bayside. Interment Calverton National Cemetery.
